somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong! Try again later!
home1: The only app that allows you to manage all aspects of school life in one place. On our portal, right after checking your grades, you can start preparing for exams using flashcards or by reading notes on the subject.
home2: And that's just a part of the features our app offers...
homeFlashcards1: Flashcards in our app are a learning tool. Users create their own flashcards, and the app assists in revisions. This helps users memorize information more effectively.
homeFlashcards2: It's a simple and intuitive tool that makes learning more efficient.
homeNotes1: Notes are a feature in our app that allows users to store and manage information. Users can create, edit, and categorize their notes.
homeNotes2: This helps keep their thoughts and important data organized.
homeClassRegister1: Integration with the Vulcan diary is a key feature in our app, allowing students access to grades, class schedules, and other education-related information.
homeClassRegister2: Thanks to this integration, users can conveniently track their academic progress and access resources shared by others in their class.
homeToDo1: The 'To-Do' list is a useful feature in our app that allows users to create, manage, and track their tasks and responsibilities.
homeToDo2: With it, users can plan their tasks, mark them as completed, and organize their time more efficiently.
homeEndTitle: That's the end of showcasing the key features of our app. Enjoy using it!
